lead_paragraph: The former Minnesota Vikings tight end Stu Voigt was charged in a federal indictment with conspiracy and fraud in a reported Ponzi scheme.

headline.main: Former Viking Is Accused of Fraud

snippet: The former Minnesota Vikings tight end Stu Voigt was charged in a federal indictment with conspiracy and fraud in a reported Ponzi scheme.
abstract: Former Minnesota Vikings tight end Stu Voigt is under federal indictment for conspiracy and fraud in reported Ponzi scheme.
